node.excerpt:
Promotional video for the  Badhinjan Trio  to give a good glimpse at their musical style, singularity, and talent.
It is aimed to help the band showcase their work on social networks and to concert halls. Role on this project:  Film maker .
Oooooh-weeee, my first blog post! Experimental video made using still photographies. Role on this project:  Film maker Direct Link
